actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish a Commission to study and evaluate the scope and consequences of genetic research and engineering.
short_title: Commission on Genetic Research and Engineering Act

summary.text: Establishes a Commission on Genetic Research and Engineering to study and evaluate present laws and regulations concerning genetic research and engineering. Requires the Commission to review and make recommendations with respect to genetic research and engineering conducted by Federal agencies.

titles.title: Commission on Genetic Research and Engineering Act
A bill to establish a Commission to study and evaluate the scope and consequences of genetic research and engineering.
